item.title: CA-1 South at Valley Ford - Estero Road
item.description: CA-1 South at Valley Ford - Estero Road to Dillon Beach. Continue south on CA-1 for Point Reyes Station.

item.title: CA-1 North at Freestone-Valley Ford Road
item.description: CA-1 North at Freestone-Valley Ford Road. Turn right for Occidental and Monte Rio. Continue on CA-1 for Jenner.

item.title: Sir Frances Drake Blvd. East at CA-1
item.description: Sir Frances Drake Blvd. east at CA-1. Use CA-1 north for Petaluma. Use CA-1 south for San Rafael and San Francisco.

item.title: CA-1 South in Point Reyes Station
item.description: CA-1 south in Point Reyes Station. Turn left on A St. to continue south on CA-1 for San Francisco.
